import heapq

def longest_time_on_tv(N, R, L, records):
    pq = [[0, i] for i in range(1, N + 1)]
    m = dict(zip(range(1, N + 1), pq))
    time = [0] * (N + 1)
    INVALID = -1
    pre_t = 0
    for (d, t, x) in records:
        top_team = pq[0]
        time[top_team[1]] += t - pre_t
        pre_t = t
        if top_team[1] == d:
            top_team[0] -= x
            if x < 0:
                heapq.heapreplace(pq, top_team)
        else:
            scored_team = m[d][:]
            scored_team[0] -= x
            heapq.heappush(pq, scored_team)
            m[d][1] = INVALID
            m[d] = scored_team
        while pq[0][1] == INVALID:
            heapq.heappop(pq)
    time[pq[0][1]] -= L - pre_t
    return time.index(max(time))

    m = dict(zip(range(1, N + 1), pq))
    time = [0] * (N + 1)
    INVALID = -1
    pre_t = 0
    for (d, t, x) in records:
        top_team = pq[0]
        time[top_team[1]] += t - pre_t
        pre_t = t
        if top_team[1] == d:
            top_team[0] -= x
            if x < 0:
                heapq.heapreplace(pq, top_team)
        else:
            scored_team = m[d][:]
            scored_team[0] -= x
            heapq.heappush(pq, scored_team)
            m[d][1] = INVALID
            m[d] = scored_team
        while pq[0][1] == INVALID:
            heapq.heappop(pq)
    time[pq[0][1]] += L - pre_t
    return time.index(max(time))
